article_title: Andy Levy says Chris Brown is making progress – twitchy.com
article_text:
As Twitchy reported, singer Chris Brown was arrested and put in jail this morning on a felony assault charge. Brown’s victim was male, which as Fox News’ Andy Levy notes, is preferable to beating up women.

But why stop there? Perhaps the R&B star can progress one step further:

Assulting himself would be an even bigger step RT “@andylevy: chris brown assaulted a man, which i guess for him qualifies as progress” — Ethan A. Calvin (@Ethan__Calvin) October 27, 2013

Earlier:

Tweeters call for Chris Brown to be freed after singer jailed on felony assault charge
